entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
